welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tottington, a charming town known for its picturesque countryside and friendly residents. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty and warmth of our community and explore all that Tottington has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is responsible for all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Blackpool Airport caters to private and business flights, offering exclusive lounges and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
